titleInfo.title: Was Brought to the Second Municipality Police Prison.

mods.abstract: WAS BROUGHT to the Second Muncipality Police Prison -- ELIZA, a dark griffe, aged about 30 years, 5 feet 2 1/2 inches high ; says she belongs to MrLawson or MrMorton, of New OrleansKITTY, a dark griffe, aged about 65 years, 5 feet 3 inches high ; says she belongs to MrSauvary, of NewOrleansJUDY, a dark griffe, aged about 40 years, 5 feet 2 inches high ; says she belongs to MrGirod, of NewOrleansJIM, a dark griffe, aged about 26 years, 5 feet 0 inches high ; says he belongs to MrGoode, of Springfield, LaThe owner swill please comply with the law regarding themJWORRELL, WardenNewOrleans, February 2, 1852fe3 1aw3w
mods.note: MrLawson or MrMorton; MrSauvary; MrGirod; MrGoode

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU LibrariesCopyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domainPermission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
